name: YamanoteLine
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yamanote line
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the evocative sounds of the Yamanote line, even when you're not in Japan! 

This virtual trip around Tokyo's favourite railway loop combines the real station melodies, announcements and door chimes with the sound of the train running along the tracks.

Travelling twice the speed of the real Yamanote line, you can travel around the virtual loop in just 30 minutes.

Once you launch the skill you'll be asked which station you wish to depart from and in which direction you wish to travel (clockwise or anticlockwise). 

You can pick any one of 29 stations:

JY01: Tokyo
JY02: Kanda
JY03: Akihabara
JY04: Okachimachi
JY05: Ueno
JY06: Uguisudani
JY07: Nippori
JY08: Nishi-Nippori
JY09: Tabata
JY10: Komagome
JY11: Sugamo
JY12: Otsuka
JY13: Ikebukuro
JT14: Mejiro
JY15: Takadanobaba
JY16: Shin-Okubo
JY17: Shinjuku
JY18: Yoyogi
JY19: Harajuku
JY20: Shibuya
JY21: Ebisu
JY22: Meguro
JY23: Gotanda
JY24: Osaki
JY25: Shinagawa
JY27: Tamachi
JY28: Hamamatsucho
JY29: Shimbashi
JY30: Yurakucho
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
